name: Flickr Dark
description: A simple dark theme for Flickr. I feel there's still some part I not theme yet since I'm not an active user there and I've no interaction with other user. Hopefully no whiteness left.
css:
@-moz-document domain("flickr.com") {
  
.authHead
 {background: transparent url(https://combo.staticflickr.com/pw/images/icon_key_small.png) 9px 12px no-repeat;}
  
#global-nav .bd,.fluid .droparound .droparrow::after,
.DisabledButt, .DisabledButt:link, .DisabledButt:active, .DisabledButt:visited, .SmallDisabledButt, .SmallDisabledButt:link, .SmallDisabledButt:active, .SmallDisabledButt:visited,.fluid .butt.is-disabled, .fluid .butt:disabled, .fluid button.is-disabled,

  {background: rgba(09,09,09,0.9);}
